description: Erection of ground and first floor rear extensions, rear elevation fenestration alterations and associated works.
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: rgb(32, 33, 36); font-family: Arial; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">The development hereby approved shall provide two swift boxes close to the eaves prior to first occupation and shall be retained as such in perpetuity.&nbsp;</span><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-8f64b026-7fff-909c-b3ea-7d49edd82aca"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(32, 33, 36); background-color: transparent; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: </span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(32, 33, 36); background-color: transparent; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">I</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(32, 33, 36); background-color: transparent; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">n the interest of biodiversity.</span></p>
